mapper.select: select ms_num, ms_id = ${id} , MS_PASSWORD= ${pw} FROM MS_MAININFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MS_MAININFO( MS_NUM, MS_ID, MS_PASSWORD, MS_NAME, MS_SEX, MS_BIRTH, MS_FIRST_PHONE, MS_MID_PHONE, MS_LASTPHONE, SMS_CHK1, MS_BLANK, MS_HOMEADDR1, MS_HOMEADDR2, MS_REGDAY, INPUT_STAFF, INPUT_DATETIME, INPUT_IP, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_IP ) VALUE( )
